titleNullable: COVID-19 Vaccine Candidates From The WHO
subtitleNullable: Location of vaccine developers, social traffic, and Google News results
descriptionNullable:
### Context

I wanted to take the PDFs of vaccine candidates and see if I could generate further detail for analysis: the locations of clinical trials, news and social media activity around each candidate. 


### Content

The content is largely an augmentation of a WHO blueprint PDF on COVID-19 with added columns that split the developers into individual components along with the top GMaps candidate for each developer, adds a column for the number of Tweets about a candidate + tag COVID-19 and Google News results around each candidate. 

There are several known issues with the data: sometimes the top GMaps candidate is inaccurate for the place search for whatever reason. This is especially true for a vaccine developer who has a fairly generic name, multiple HQs etc. This is less true for university institutions which tend to be very geographically fixed.

The tweets I source have to include COVID-19 along with the vaccine candidate name...unfortunately, some of the vaccine candidates are quite generically named such that they refer to common biological words. Hopefully, in future, especially with more trials, there's an evolution from generic placeholder names to more specific variant names that allows social traffic and news articles around a vaccine to be more easily differentiated. 


### Acknowledgements

I'd like to thank the WHO for providing this information. 


### Inspiration

I want to track the progress of vaccine candidates in a systematic fashion and try to get as much emerging news or Tweets about vaccines as possible. I might post sporadic updates to the dataset and/or put the script I use to obtain the results on Github going forward.
